definition: to appoint people by favoritism (idiom); nepotism/corrupt appointment
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: Consider your- self fortunate if you do not work for this type of company.
sentences.chinese: 你該慶幸，倘若你沒有在這種任人唯親的公司工作。

definition: to gang up for personal interest (idiom)/to form a clique
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
to assess one's income and spend accordingly (idiom); to live within one's means/You can only spend what you earn.
lit. to kill the chicken to get the eggs (idiom)/fig. to kill the goose that lays the golden eggs
each sticks to his own version (idiom); a dialogue of the deaf
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
